title: AI Unix Philosophy & System Architecture
description: Architectural guidelines for modular, interactive, and fractal agent systems.

principles.unix_modularity: Create small, single-purpose Python scripts orchestrated by the CLI.
principles.boomerang_orchestration: Agent executes tools, provides feedback, and stops to await human intent.
principles.fractal_memory: Local json/ directories allow project-specific context while inheriting global principles.
principles.declarative_imperative_duality: Employ a dual approach. Imperative code is guided by metadeclarative comments within the same file.
principles.extensibility: Prioritize objective simplicity (de-complecting concerns) over subjective easiness. Write simple parts connected by clean interfaces.
